name: If you know what I mean
name_original: If you know what I mean
description:
It is a real and very emotional story about Emily and her own life. It is full of adventures and excitements. Hope, you will enjoy!

“If you know what I mean" is a nice Visual Novel featuring:

  • Different choices

  • Realistic backgrounds

  • Relaxing background music

  • Many Steam Achievements

Just make right choices and enjoy the story!
